title: Lewis Hamilton reveals father's advice as Formula One history beckons after Russian Grand Prix victory
text: Lewis Hamilton reveals fatherâ€™s advice as Formula One history beckons after Russian Grand Prix victory Briton closing in on third world championship, but refuses to get carried away Blonde ambition: Lewis Hamilton can win a third world title at the United States GP next week Photo: GETTY IMAGES By Daniel Johnson , Formula One Correspondent 10:00PM BST 12 Oct 2015
